text: Servet Pëllumbi (born December 12, 1936) is an Albanian politician. He was born in Korçë, Albania. He was Chairman of the Assembly of the Republic of Albania from 30 April 2002 until 3 September 2005. \- Republika e Shqipërisë KUVEND. Tiranë 2005 Pëllumbi is a lecturer in Political Academy of the Socialist Party of Albania. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Chairpersons of the Parliament of Albania
title: Servet Pëllumbi
